statements: DELETE FROM SmartMeterData WHERE reading_date ='2023-01-15' AND reading_time = '14:30:00';
DELETE FROM SmartMeterData WHERE consumption_kwh > 100 AND voltage <= 220;
DELETE FROM SmartMeterData WHERE reading_date = '2023-05-15' AND reading_time > '12:00:00';
DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE meter_id IN (SELECT meter_id FROM smart_meters WHERE city = 'New York') AND consumption_date >= '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM electricity_readings WHERE meter_id IN (SELECT meter_id FROM smart_meters WHERE installation_date < '2021-01-01');
DELETE FROM usage_history WHERE meter_id = 500 AND usage_value > 100;
